summary: Fiat is an Italian car company with a long history, starting in 1899. It's now a part of a bigger company called Stellantis. Fiat is the biggest car maker in Italy and was once one of the largest in the world. They've built many types of vehicles, from trains to tractors. Fiat cars are made in several countries, with Brazil being a major producer. The company has won lots of awards for its cars, especially for being kind to the environment.
title: Fiat
